SENT.plain: A case is presented of a rare anterior inferior cerebellar artery variant, originating from the internal carotid artery
This mimicked a cerebellar infarct on vertebral angiography of a patient who presented with dysmetria and gait imbalance

It is important for the neuroradiologist and neurointerventionist to be aware of common and unusual cerebellar arterial anatomic variants to avoid incorrect diagnoses, as well as understand possible implications for surgery and interventional therapies
